backend/main.mo: Defines categories, workers, inquiries, and user profiles with authorization, approval, and storage mixins; includes admin checks and CRUD state maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing admin login button additions and routing behavior, mapping affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like text summarizing many frontend files including routing, hooks, UI components, worker flows, and admin panels.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables for light/dark modes with extensive color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML scaffold loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes including admin login and dashboard wrapped in AppLayout with theme provider and toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/Categories: Admin UI to list, create, edit, and delete categories with dialog forms and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiriesA: Admin panel for filtering, updating, and deleting inquiries with status controls and session-aware error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/WorkersAdm: Admin panel for listing, filtering, and approving/rejecting/removing worker accounts.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication with loading states.
frontend/src/components/Brand.tsx: Displays the SevaSangam brand name in English, Hindi, and Assamese.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Displays a grid of category cards linking to category pages with sprite-based icons.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAd: Route guard that restricts pages to authenticated admins and redirects or shows errors.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAu: Requires user authentication and prompts Internet Identity login if not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapping pages with header, footer, and content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Simple footer displaying a copyright-style message.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive site header with navigation, auth controls, and admin/user-specific links.
frontend/src/components/search/HomeSearc: Home search form allowing users to filter workers by category, location, and availability.
frontend/src/components/workers/PhotoPic: Photo upload component that previews and manages worker profile images using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCa: Card UI showing a workerâ€™s photo, details, and link to their profile.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCo: Buttons for calling or WhatsApp messaging a worker using generated contact links.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerPr: Form component that edits an existing worker profile, handling major-field reapproval logic and updating structured profile data before submit.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerRe: Registration form for creating a new worker profile, constructing a full WorkerProfile object using Internet Identity on submit.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin login state using stored credentials, validating access via actor calls and providing login/logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Aggregates worker and admin authentication states into a simple authorization object.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identity loading, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, categories, and admin-protected data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark theming and UI color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up QueryClient, and wraps the app with InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard with tabs for managing workers, categories, and inquiries, including logout handling and admin access guard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Admin login form with credential handling, error display, and redirect for already authenticated admins.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesIndexPage.t: Displays all service categories with a grid of category cards.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Shows workers in a specific category with loading state and empty state handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page featuring hero section, search panel, and category browsing.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Filters and displays workers based on search criteria with options to clear filters and handle empty results.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerDashboardPage.t: Worker dashboard for viewing and editing profile, showing status, and handling profile updates.
Worker onboarding flow including Internet Identity login, user profile setup, and worker registration.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerProfilePage.tsx: Renders a worker profile page showing photo, details, pricing, availability, and contact actions, with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/utils/adminApiErrorHandling: Provides helpers to detect admin unauthorized errors and clear admin session with a user-friendly message.
frontend/src/utils/adminSessionStorage.t: Manages admin session storage with functions to save, retrieve, clear, and check session state.
frontend/src/utils/categories.ts: Defines category IDs, names, and returns a numeric icon index for each worker category.
frontend/src/utils/contactLinks.ts: Generates normalized phone numbers and tel/WhatsApp links with optional messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL/hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings for the project.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing goals, architecture, features, and current issues for SevaSangam.
